1.name: Pilgrim's Progress
1.description: Consists of two parts: Part One: The Life of John Bunyon (2 reels); Part Two: The Pilgrim's Progress (3 reels).

2.name: From the Manger to the Cross; or, Jesus of Nazareth

3.name: Cleopatra
3.description: The fabled queen of Egypt's affair with Roman general Marc Antony is ulimately disastrous for both of them.

4.name: Satana
4.description: A four chapter film including Satan vs the Creator, Satan vs the Saviour, The Green Demon/Satan during the Dark Ages and The Red Demon/Satan in modern times.

5.name: La dame aux camélias

6.name: Richard III
6.description: Richard of Gloucester uses manipulation and murder to gain the English throne.

7.name: Le mystère des roches de Kador

8.name: Grannie
8.description: There is no documentation that a film bearing this title was directed by D.W. Griffith, or was produced by Biograph at this time. It may have been suspended before completion or else released under another title.

9.name: Independenta Romaniei
9.description: The movie depicts the Romanian War of Independence (1877-1878).

10.name: The Flying Circus

11.name: Oliver Twist
11.description: An orphan in early 19th century England escapes the poorhouse only to fall among a gang of pickpockets in London.

12.name: The Three Musketeers
12.description: D'Artagnan and his musketeer comrades must thwart the plans of Cardinal Richelieu to usurp King Louis XIII's power.

15.name: Oliver Twist
15.description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

18.name: Quincy Adams Sawyer
18.description: A Bostonian acts as a go-between for a foundling and her suitor in the small town of Mason's Corners, learning that the young woman's foster mother has hidden the secret of her parentage.

19.name: Vampyrdanserinden

21.name: Wenn die Maske fällt
21.description: Drama about jealousy, high finance and a mistress. Sanna, scorned by her lover Willi won't abandon him, but saves him from financial ruin. The swindling banker is brought to justice and Sanna reunites with Willi.

26.name: The Sergeant's Boy
26.description: An army sergeant befriends an orphan boy.

29.name: Lucretia Borgia
29.description: About the daughter of the Borgia, a noble medieval house. From her numerous and unhappy weddings, to the forced monacation, to the will of her family.

39.name: Samhällets dom
39.description: Harald steals money in order to pay a personal guarantee. The crime is discovered and he is sentenced to imprisonment. After the penalty is served he travels to America to begin a new life.

40.name: The Great Circus Catastrophe
40.description: A melodrama about the destitute Count lured into a circus environment and forced to show their daring high up in the circus dome.
